Package Hexxagon.AI

Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement functionalities of artificial intelligence.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBoardState
    Contains method specifications of state of board caused by alternate steps of players.
    IHeuristic
    Contains method specifications of heuristic value determination.
    IHeuristicFactory
    Contains method specifications factory class of heuristic object.
    IMinMax
    Contains method specifications of MinMax forsee algorithm.
    IOperator
    Contains specifications of common methods of different operators applied in game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardState
    Contains the implementation of sate component specified by IBoardState interface.
    FissionOperator
    Contains method of fission step applied on board state.
    Heuristic
    The heuristic class to tell the goodness of a state node in a forsee tree.
    Heuristic.HeuristicFactory
    The factory class of heuristic class.
    ImpossibleOperator
    Contains method of an operator which is never apliciable of any board state.
    JumpOperator
    Contains method of jump step applied on board state.
    MinMax
    The implementation of the MinMax forsee algorithm.
    MinMax.BranchResult
    It is a helper class to represent a node in the forsee tree.
    Operator
    Contains shared methods of different type of operators.

Package Hexxagon.AI Description

Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement functionalities of artificial intelligence.
